name: Horion 65-inch Smart Board 4k Interactive Display Digital Whiteboard with 48MP Camera Android 13 All in One 50-Point Multi-Touch Electronic Smart White Board for Office Classroom (with Wall Mount)
short_description: 【4K Ultra HD Interactive Touch Screen】: Instant response to every touch, High-precision touch for fluid writing and instant display. Add tables, images, and more with ease. Scan to save or share-it’s all intuitive. It is include Smart Recognition, Zoom In and Out, Scan to Take Away, Smart touch recognition supports over 20 languages for standard text input on the whiteboard.

Auto framing intelligent composition and speaker tracking dynamic focus, locking speakers in real time, always keeping them in the spotlight, making remote meetings say goodbye to loose pictures, and making every communication more focused and efficient!

【All-in-One Multimedia Display】:Whether it's a proposal presentation in an enterprise conference room, an immersive product display in an exhibition hall, or interactive teaching in a classroom, the all-in-one multimedia display system seamlessly integrates text, images, audio, and video content with high-definition visuals, smooth interaction, and multi-device compatibility. It creates a visually striking centerpiece that delivers impactful presentations, ensuring every showcase resonates powerfully with the audience.

【50-Touch Point Interactive Whiteboard】:This intelligent interactive whiteboard leverages advanced 50-point multitouch technology, enabling seamless collaboration among multiple users simultaneously. With ultra-low latency response, it delivers fluid handwriting simulation and instant annotation capabilities, ensuring every stroke and mark-up reflects real-time creativity. Perfect for modern enterprises and educational institutions, it transforms meetings into highly collaborative environments and classroom interactions into immersive learning experiences, where ideas flow freely and productivity knows no bounds.

【Android 13 & Google Play】: The smooth animation engine and multitasking capabilities of Android 13 enable the whiteboard to run multiple applications simultaneously, such as teaching courseware, conference software, and real-time annotation tools, with silky-smooth operation and no lag. It provides direct access apps on Google Play, allowing one-click download of adapted interactive teaching apps (such as Nearpod and Kahoot!) and conference collaboration tools (such as Zoom and Microsoft Teams), which can run natively without additional adaptation.
If you have any issues with your product, please feel free to contact us, our customer service will reply you within 24 hours and help you solve the problems as soon as possible.
